GSD.description:
media: atomisp: fix dummy_ptr check to avoid duplicate active_bo

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 3f887cb763a0443e4c1adb5fe5a6d6058f4b3d96. For more details please see the references link.
